title: Electrosphere Launcher
summaries: The Electrosphere Launcher is a Hardmode, post-Golem launcher that fires rockets to the position of the cursor, then forms an energy-emanating ball of constant damage for approximately 8 seconds. An infinite number of electrospheres can be summoned, but they cannot overlap, with newer electrospheres replacing older ones. The Electrosphere Launcher has a 1/6 (16.67%) chance to be dropped by the Martian Saucer during the Martian Madness event.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
